title: Eco-Friendly Ganpati Murti & Painting Making
description: Celebrate creativity with sustainability! 🌱 Join us for an eco-friendly Ganpati murti and painting making competition.
content:
🎉 **Event Highlights**
- Eco-friendly Ganpati murti making 🪔
- Painting making 🎨

💰 **Entry Fees**: ₹20 per person

📅 **Date**: 3rd September 2025
📍 **Venue**: Suryodaya College of Engineering

👥 **Coordinators**:
- Khushi Bonde
- Aditi Halmare

📝 **Registration Link**: [Click Here](https://forms.gle/8Hpv26A9VM7wyUzv7)

Come, showcase your talent and creativity while promoting a green and sustainable celebration! 🌿

title: Innovator's Quest Winners Announced
description: Celebrating the visionaries of tomorrow! Here's to the brilliant minds who emerged victorious in Innovator's Quest 2025.
content:
🥇 1st Place - **Team Elite**
- Vivek Dhumenkhede
- Saharyar Ansari
- Uday Gupta
- Devesh Bhelave

🥈 1st Runner-Up - **Team VIP's**
- Mayank Shukla
- Vansh Golia
- Uday Gharat
- Pranav Lavhe

“Congratulations to the champions of innovation!”

Your solutions, teamwork, and creativity stood out in every round of the competition. We applaud your exceptional performance and forward-thinking spirit.

🔹 Hosted by: **Department of Data Science**
🔹 Organized by: **Data Science Student Association (DSSA)**
🔹 Event Date: **28th July 2025**
🔹 Location: College Auditorium

Thank you to all participating teams for making this event a grand success and raising the bar of innovation. Stay tuned for upcoming tech challenges and showcases.

title: Innovator's Quest
description: A one-of-a-kind inter-branch showdown where innovation meets imagination! Think smart, 🛠️ build bold, and 🧠 outplay the rest in this thrilling three-round event packed with puzzles, creativity, and pure genius.
content: The Data Science Student Association proudly hosted 'Innovator's Quest', a flagship inter-branch innovation challenge designed to ignite creativity, teamwork, and technical prowess across disciplines.
